item.title: RFK Jr. to Congress: ‘I don’t think people should be taking medical advice from me’
item.description: The nation’s top health official, Robert F. Kennedy Jr., faces questions from lawmakers on his response to the measles outbreak and plans for budget c...

item.title: Trump peddles false conspiracy theories tying Clintons to several deaths
item.description: Donald Trump has made thousands of false claims about his political opponents across his two terms in office while threatening his critics.

item.title: Trump says he will speak to Putin, Zelensky about Ukraine war on Monday
item.description: Russia and Ukraine held direct talks — their first since the early weeks of the war — in Turkey this week.

item.title: Trump calls on Walmart to absorb tariffs rather than raise prices
item.description: President Donald Trump on Saturday scolded Walmart for saying that his tariffs would force the retailer to up its prices.

item.title: Republicans set make-believe deadline, turning agenda into process story
item.description: By setting and missing fake timelines, congressional majorities always shift the focus away from policy and toward how policy “sausage” is made.
